title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 361 - Credit Under Retirement And Social Security Law Section 384-d For Service Rendered For A Previous Employer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 361 - Credit Under Retirement And Social Security Law Section 384-d For Service Rendered For A Previous Employer

State Regulations
§ 361.1 - Section 384-d credit for previous employment

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 361

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, §§311, 384-d

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
